SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

net.sf.oval.constraint
Annotation Type AssertURL

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,PARAMETER,METHOD})
@Constraint(checkWith=AssertURLCheck.class)
public @interface AssertURL

Check if the value is a valid URL.

Note: This constraint is also satisfied when the value to validate is null, therefore you might also need to specified @NotNull

Author:
Sebastian Thomschke

Optional Element Summary
 boolean connect
          Specifies if a connection to the URL should be attempted to verify its validity.
 String errorCode
          error code passed to the ConstraintViolation object
 String message
          message to be used for the ContraintsViolatedException
 AssertURLCheck.URIScheme[] permittedURISchemes
          Specifies the allowed URL schemes.
 String[] profiles
          The associated constraint profiles.
 int severity
          severity passed to the ConstraintViolation object
 

connect

public abstract boolean connect
Specifies if a connection to the URL should be attempted to verify its validity.

Default:
false

errorCode

public abstract String errorCode
error code passed to the ConstraintViolation object

Default:
"net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertURL"

message

public abstract String message
message to be used for the ContraintsViolatedException

See Also:
ConstraintViolation
Default:
"net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertURL.violated"

permittedURISchemes

public abstract AssertURLCheck.URIScheme[] permittedURISchemes
Specifies the allowed URL schemes.

Default:
{net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertURLCheck.URIScheme.HTTP, net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertURLCheck.URIScheme.HTTPS, net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertURLCheck.URIScheme.FTP}

profiles

public abstract String[] profiles
The associated constraint profiles.

Default:
{}

severity

public abstract int severity
severity passed to the ConstraintViolation object

Default:
0
